post.text: With just 56 days until Election Day, President Obama is back out on the trail for Hillary. Watch live as he takes the stage in Philadelphia.

comment.author: Courtney
comment.text: What a difference between the parties. Please get out and vote for hillary

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: Im voting trump. You ask whats the difference? I say plenty.

replies.author: Travis
replies.text: Yeah.. one party wants to save the nation.. The other wants to give it away... Vote republican if you care anything at all about the next generation..

replies.author: Cory
replies.text: Vote for tbe corrupt demorcrats ! She lues in your face and you just suck it up @ haha
